TopicTitle: Cannot alt-click a part to copy it in linux

Articles.Content:
In the windows version I use alt-click a lot to copy (multiple) parts.

This does not work in linux?
Try using right Shift. I believe by default this is the Mod key (what Alt is to Windows) on Linux.

Yea I'm almost 100% sure its 'Right shift'

Threw me off at first too.
Yeah, right-shift, because left-alt is in use by Ubuntu to move windows, and right-alt is not present on enough keyboards.

Ah ok. It had me puzzled.

Would be nice if it showed up in the key-settings-menu, imho.

Together with some other 'poorly-documented key(combo)s', like shift> for example.
Most of the keybindings are documented here: http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/Key_bindings some other here http://imgur.com/a/NMdxR
